## Type of change

- [ ] `feat` — new feature
- [ ] `fix` — bug fix
- [ ] `chore` — maintenance, deps, config
- [ ] `docs` — documentation only
- [ ] `refactor` — no behavior change

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm run build` passes locally
- [ ] New source files have a `@fileId` UUID header
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]` (if user-visible change)
- [ ] `src/version.js` `release.notes` updated (if this is a release PR)
- [ ] No hardcoded version strings (use `package.json` / `__APP_VERSION__`)
